description: Object Storage as a Service added under the Addon section.
Fixed billing / Bundle package option introduced during VM launch for simplified pricing.
KYC Verification process added for new user signups to ensure secure access.
Stripe Payment Gateway integrated for seamless and secure transactions.

CloudPortal CMP has released a new plugin that provides Kubernetes as a service. This plugin offers an easy and efficient way to manage Kubernetes clusters, simplifying the deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.

CloudPortal 3.01 which has been comes up with various updates like ACS 4.16 upgrade and compatibility verification in CloudPortal, VM setting integration, Advanced monitoring auto upgrade and much more
